b'One of the craziest days I can remember. For the content you came for, check out $LSSDF. It\xe2\x80\x99s a 1/3 warrant for tower company $RADI. You don\xe2\x80\x99t need to be convinced that $RADI is worth more (it appears to be) only that option pricing will work and it\xe2\x80\x99s a double. \xe2\x9d\xa4\xef\xb8\x8f y\xe2\x80\x99all'
